solution_line_template: The back wheel has double the spokes the front wheel has, which means the back wheel has {front_spokes}*{back_multiplier}=<<{front_spokes}*{back_multiplier}={back_spokes}>>{back_spokes} spokes.
In total, the bicycle has {front_spokes}+{back_spokes}=<<{front_spokes}+{back_spokes}={total_spokes}>>{total_spokes} spokes.
